model.name: Pont Neuf 35mm
model.disambiguatingDescription: This business buckle provides a perfect option for more understated looks. Coloured edge dying adds a twist to the Taiga leather strap, with an LV cutout contributing a subtle branded touch.

additionalProperty.name: detailedDescription
additionalProperty.value:
- Width: 35 mm / 1.4 inches
- Taiga leather
- Calf leather lining
- Brass buckle with shiny palladium finishing
- LV Signature on the metal loop
